請出す: (うけだす) - to redeem/to take out of pawn; to buy a geisha or prostitute out of bondage (by paying off her debt to her employer)
請取る: (うけとる) - to receive/to get/to accept; to take/to interpret/to understand
請合う: (うけあう) - to undertake/to take on (task); to assure/to guarantee/to vouch (for)/to promise
請売り: (うけうり) - retailing; second-hand opinion or knowledge/telling at second hand/second-hand telling
請宿: (うけやど) - agency that dispatches lodged servants
請戻し: (うけもどし) - redemption (e.g. of a loan)
請戻す: (うけもどす) - to redeem (e.g. mortgage, pawned article); to ransom; to take up
請暇: (せいか) - vacation request; request for leave of absence
請書: (うけしょ) - written acknowledgement; written acknowledgment; receipt
請求: (seikyuu) - claim, demand, charge, application, request, billing (para um serviço)
請求先住所: (せいきゅうさきじゅうしょ) - billing address (e.g. credit card)
請求書: (せいきゅうしょ) - bill; job invoice
請求権を申し立てる: (せいきゅうけんをもうしたてる) - to file a claim
請求記号: (せいきゅうきごう) - call number (e.g. of a book in a library)
請求頂: (せいきゅうこう) - claim (esp. in a patent)
請求項: (せいきゅうこう) - claim (esp. in a patent)
請求額: (せいきゅうがく) - amount billed or claimed
請花: (うけばな) - ukebana (lotus-shaped support of a seat, pedestal or pagoda finial)
請負: (うけおい) - contract (for work); contracting; undertaking
請負う: (うけおう) - to contract/to undertake; to take over/to take responsibility for
請負業: (うけおいぎょう) - the contracting business
請負業者: (うけおいぎょうしゃ) - independent contractor
請願権: (せいがんけん) - right to petition (the government)
諌め: (いさめ) - remonstrance; remonstration; admonition; protest; reproof; expostulation; advice; counsel
諌める: (いさめる) - to remonstrate; to warn not to do something
諌死: (かんし) - committing suicide (to remonstrate or dissuade one's lord); preparing to die in an effort to dissuade one's lord
諍う: (いさかう) - to quarrel; to dispute
諒する: (りょうする) - to acknowledge; to understand; to appreciate
諒とする: (りょうとする) - to acknowledge; to understand; to appreciate
諒察: (りょうさつ) - consideration; taking into account; sympathy with
諒承: (りょうしょう) - acknowledgement; acknowledgment; understanding (e.g. "please be understanding of the mess during our renovation"); noting; acceptance
諒解: (りょうかい) - comprehension; consent; understanding; agreement; roger (on the radio)
諒闇: (りょうあん) - court mourning (for the late emperor or empress); national mourning
諒陰: (りょうあん) - court mourning (for the late emperor or empress); national mourning
論: (ron) - theory , argument, discussion, dispute, controversy, discourse, debate; theory (ex. de evolução), doctrine; essay, treatise, comment
論い: (あげつらい) - argumenting; discussion; criticizing; finding fault; splitting hairs
論う: (あげつらう) - to discuss; to find fault with/to criticize/to criticise
論じる: (ろんじる) - to argue; to discuss; to debate
論じ合う: (ろんじあう) - to debate; to deliberate; to argue; to contend; to discuss; to dispute
論じ尽くす: (ろんじつくす) - to deal exhaustively with
論ずる: (ろんずる) - to argue; to discuss; to debate
論より証拠: (ろんよりしょうこ) - the proof of the pudding is in the eating; evidence is better than debate
論をまたない: (ろんをまたない) - needless to say; it goes without saying
論を俟たない: (ろんをまたない) - needless to say; it goes without saying
論功行賞: (ろんこうこうしょう) - (yoji) conferral of honors (honours), according to merits
論及: (ろんきゅう) - mention; reference to; touching upon
論叢: (ろんそう) - treatise or essay collection
論告求刑: (ろんこくきゅうけい) - closing argument and sentencing recommendation (of a prosecutor)
論壇: (ろんだん) - rostrum; the world of criticism
論外: (ろんがい) - out of the question
論孟: (ろんもう) - The Confucian Analects and the Discourses of Mencius
論弁的: (ろんべんてき) - discursive (i.e. proceeding by argument or reasoning rather than intuition)
論戦を張る: (ろんせんをはる) - (unorthodox version of 論陣を張る)  to take a firm stand; to argue about
論拠: (ろんきょ) - grounds of an argument
論敵: (ろんてき) - opponent in a debate or argument
論文博士: (ろんぶんはくし) - doctoral degree (e.g. PhD) by thesis only
論文式試験: (ろんぶんしきしけん) - essay-type test; essay-based examination
論文集: (ろんぶんしゅう) - collected papers; collected works; collection of articles and essays
論旨: (ろんし) - point of an argument; drift of an argument
論旨不明: (ろんしふめい) - (yoji) the point of an argument being unclear; the tenor of an argument being poorly reasoned
論旨明快: (ろんしめいかい) - (yoji) the point of an argument being clearly stated; the tenor of an argument being well-reasoned
論書: (ろんしょ) - textbook of Buddhist treatises (containing interpretation of the sutras)
論法: (ろんぽう) - logic; reasoning; argument; line of argument
論点: (ろんてん) - point in question (at issue)
論理けた送り: (ろんりけたおくり) - logical shift; logic shift
